actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 103(a) of the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation under the provisions of the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to regulate seatbelt standards to prohibit motor vehicles from being equipped with starter interlock systems.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 103(a) of the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966.
